name: 伊柏文
objective:
1. 深度學習介紹，2. 監督式學習，3. 無監督式學習，4. 物聯網，5. 感知層，6. 網路層，7. 應用層，8. 深度學習與物聯網應用實例。
1. Introduction to Deep Learning, 2. Supervised Learning, 3. Unsupervised Learning, 4. Internet of Things, 5. Perception Layer, 6. Network Layer, 7. Application Layer, 8. Deep Learning and Internet of Things
schedule:
1-2  Introduction to Deep Learning
3-4. Supervised Learning
5-6. Unsupervised Learning, 
7-8. Internet of Things, 
9-10. Perception Layer, 
11-12. Network Layer, 
13-14. Application Layer
15-16. Deep Learning and Internet of Things
17-18 Final Report
scorePolicy:
Homework: 50%
Attendance:10%
Final project and report: 40%
materials:
References :

1. Goodfellow, I., Bengio, Y. & Courville, A.: Deep Learning. 2016, MIT.
2. B.K. Tripathy, J. Anuradham: Internet of Things(IoT): Technologies, 
    Applications, Challenges and Solutions, CRC Press, Taylor and Francis, 
    2017
3.  Anirudh Koul, Siddha Ganju, Meher Kasam: Practical Deep Learning for 
    Cloud, Mobile, and Edge: Real-World AI & Computer-Vision Projects Using 
    Python, Keras & TensorFlow 1st Edition
